oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: American Ace Show - 1955-05-28
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM program American Ace Show, held at the Ryman on May 28, 1955 between Opry segments. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Marty Robbins (host, performer), Goldie Hill (performer), Cowboy Copas (performer), and Ernie Newton (performer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Marty Robbins; Goldie Hill; Cowboy Copas; Ernie Newton
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: American Ace jingle (Minnie Pearl) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner) -- Theme -- Opening statement (Marty Robbins) -- Call Me Up (And I'll Come Calling On You) (Marty Robbins) -- American Ace commercial (Grant Turner) -- Marty Robbins introduces Goldie Hill -- Please Don't Betray Me (Goldie Hill) -- Marty Robbins introduces Cowboy Copas -- Cowboy Copas talks -- The Man Upstairs (Cowboy Copas, Ernie Newton handclaps) -- American Ace commercial (Grant Turner) -- Marty Robbins talks -- Time Goes By (Marty Robbins) -- American Ace commercial (Grant Turner) -- Closing statement (Marty Robbins) -- Theme -- Closing statement (Grant Turner) -- American Ace jingle (Minnie Pearl)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); American ace show (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Robbins, Marty; Hill, Goldie; Copas, Cowboy; Newton, Ernie; Minnie Pearl
